<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Retrieve an Account's Data</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/accounts/{account_id}/data/{key}"}></MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint represents a single data for a given account.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"account_id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"This accountâ€™s public key encoded in a base32 string representation.","schema":{"type":"string","example":"GDMQQNJM4UL7QIA66P7R2PZHMQINWZBM77BEBMHLFXD5JEUAHGJ7R4JZ"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"key","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The key name for this data.","schema":{"type":"string","example":"config.memo_required"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
